lead_paragraph: Jim Furyk shot a five-under 67 yesterday for a one-stroke lead over Geoff Ogilvy after the opening round of the PGA Grand Slam of Golf in Poipu Beach, Hawaii. Tiger Woods shot a 70 and Mike Weir a 71.
snippet: Jim Furyk shot a five-under 67 yesterday for a one-stroke lead over Geoff Ogilvy after the opening round of the PGA Grand Slam of Golf in Poipu Beach, Hawaii. Tiger Woods shot a 70 and Mike Weir a 71.
